description: A minimum of 250 hours professional experience in field placements under supervision. Provides opportunity to develop skills in area of specialisation to level suitable for effective practice.
prerequisites: PSYC7251, PSYC8302 and provisional or general registration as a psychologist with the Psychology Board of Australia.
restricted: MPsychClin, DPsych, GDPsyPrac or with permission of Director of Clinical programs
